resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign to duplicate. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
campaignId.ai_hint: The ID of the campaign to duplicate. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

contactEmail.name: contactEmail
contactEmail.description: The email of the contact to add to the contact list
contactEmail.ai_hint: The email of the contact to add to the contact list

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field to add custom field to

values.name: value
values.description: The value to set on custom field

options.name: firstName
options.description: First name of the contact to add

options.name: lastContacted
options.description: Last contacted date of the contact to add

options.name: lastName
options.description: Last name of the contact to add

options.name: lastOpen
options.description: Last opened date of the contact to add

options.name: lastReplied
options.description: Last replied date of the contact to add

options.name: mailsSent
options.description: Number of emails sent to the contact to add

options.name: phoneNumber
options.description: Phone number of the contact to add

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

campaignName.name: campaignName
campaignName.description: The name of the new campaign to create
campaignName.ai_hint: The name of the new campaign to create

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
copyContacts
options.description: Whether to copy all the contacts from the original campaign

options.name: copyProvider
options.description: Whether to set the same email provider than the original campaign

options.name: copyMails
options.description: Whether to copy all the steps of the email sequence from the original campaign

options.name: copySettings
options.description: Whether to copy all the general settings from the original campaign

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

contactListId.name: contactListId
contactListId.description: The ID of the contact list to add the contact to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
contactListId.ai_hint: The ID of the contact list to add the contact to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'addContact' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'addContact' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactEmail'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'addContact' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignName'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'pause' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'start' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'duplicate' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'duplicate' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignName'
IF operation == 'duplicate' AND resource == 'campaign' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactListId'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactEmail'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
